title: Glenn Miller: a moonlight serenade
brief_description: Hosted by Van Johnson, this is the story of Glen Miller, the greatest “Big Band” leader of all time. Includes a brief history of his life and achievements and performances of his greatest hits. Including guest performances by Marion Hutton, Johnny Desmond, Anita Gillette and Sylvia Sims, this tribute to the man and his music captures the romance and unique arrangement of his music. Some of the music performed includes the all-time classics: “In the mood”, “Chattanooga Choo Choo”, “Perfidia”, “Don’t sit under the apple tree”, “Pennsylvani 6-5000”, “I’ll be seeing you” and “Moonlight serenade”.
